# serval_workflow (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_workflow" "example_workflow" {
  id = "id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the workflow.

### Read-Only

- `content` (String) The content/code of the workflow.
- `description` (String) (OPTIONAL) A description of the workflow.
- `execution_scope` (String) (OPTIONAL) The execution scope of the workflow.
Available values: "WORKFLOW_EXECUTION_SCOPE_UNSPECIFIED", "TEAM_PRIVATE", "TEAM_PUBLIC".
- `has_unpublished_changes` (Boolean) Whether there are unpublished changes to the workflow (computed by server).
- `is_published` (Boolean) (OPTIONAL) Whether the workflow is published. Set to true to publish the workflow.
- `is_temporary` (Boolean) (OPTIONAL) Whether the workflow is temporary.
- `name` (String) The name of the workflow.
- `parameters` (String) (OPTIONAL) The parameters schema of the workflow (JSON).
- `require_form_confirmation` (Boolean) (OPTIONAL) Whether the workflow requires form confirmation.
- `tag_ids` (List of String) (OPTIONAL) IDs of tags associated with this workflow.
- `team_id` (String) (IMMUTABLE) The ID of the team that the workflow belongs to.
- `type` (String) The type of the workflow.
Available values: "WORKFLOW_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED", "EXECUTABLE", "GUIDANCE".
